name: Google Cloud Realtime Database
semantic_context: Interact with Google Firebase - Realtime Database API
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Cloud Realtime Database 节点。主要用于: Interact with Google Firebase - Realtime Database API

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: As displayed in firebase console URL. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create | (必填项)
available_options: Create (值: create) - Write data to a database
Delete (值: delete) - Delete data from a database
Get (值: get) - Get a record from a database
Push (值: push) - Append to a list of data
Update (值: update) - Update item on a database

path.name: path
path.description: Object path on database. Do not append .json.
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Object Path | 作用: Object path on database. Do not append .json. | 提示: Leave blank to get a whole database object

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns / Attributes | 作用: Attributes to save | (必填项)
